inclusion.criterion: Plasma cholesterol levels greater than 200 mg/dl
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Plasma LDL-C levels greater than 130 mg/dl
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Plasma HDL-C levels greater than 70 mg/dl
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Plasma triglyceride levels greater than 150 mg/dl
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Children less than 2 years of age
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has type 1 diabetes and presents with shortness of breath and fatigue during activities. He claims mild dyspnea after climbing 3 floors, no dyspnea at rest and no angina (New York Heart Association class 2).
